Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Luella
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted EB: 93rd, Paxton, 94th, Yates and 93rd; WB: 93rd, Yates, 92nd, Luella and 93rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Luella due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 93rd, Paxton, 94th, Yates and 93rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 93rd, Yates, 92nd, Luella and 93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Lawrence
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Broadway, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Broadway, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
